MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.40 to 0.52?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Cruises, Luxury), (Attractions, Rural), (Cruises, Rural), (Destinations, Rural), (Events, Rural), (Events, Seasonal), (Hotels, Seasonal), (Online Booking, Seasonal), (Service Quality, Seasonal), (Hotels, Urban), (Online Booking, Urban), (Online Booking, Wellness), (Service Quality, Wellness), (Tour Operators, Wellness)}.
